_sText:
*** wow, old stuff***

the chopper often make servers crash if someone is driving it at the end of the round ...

maybe I should totally remake this map, I have now lot more mappers skills :)

coming soon ?

i don't know, maybe will the chopper disappear, but i really like this idea  :/

************************************************************************************








A new version of ba_jail_fortress

it content :

a flyable heli which drop bombs

two rc heli

a stadium

a bathroom

a tower

and lot of other nice things :)

i hope you will enjoy

please comment if you try it :)


edit : new version, the chopper will not crash the game if it touch a bomb
